titleStmt.title: A remonstrance, by way of address from the Church of England to both houses of Parliament, upon the account of religion Together with some remarks upon Dr. Sherlock's sermon preached the 29th. of May, 1685.
titleStmt.author: Church of England.

notesStmt.note: This edition has "the 29th. of May, 1685" in caption title.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
